name: yukae
description: yukae - an anime, manga and novel tracking app for web, mobile and desktop
author: yukae

scripts.build: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=production cross-env BUILD_TARGET=website nuxt build
scripts.dev: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=development cross-env BUILD_TARGET=website nuxt dev
scripts.generate: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=development cross-env BUILD_TARGET=website nuxt generate
scripts.preview: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=development cross-env BUILD_TARGET=website nuxt preview
scripts.postinstall: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=development cross-env BUILD_TARGET=website nuxt prepare
